A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Just seen Star Wars\, channelling modern liberalism against the dark authoritarian overlords\, the simplistic good vs evil replaced by moral quandaries and blurred lines. 

No more simplistic rebel hero's verses the black clad fascist storm troopers..

Instead there is room for a bit of anti arms trade universal condemnation of power and war and a nod to political survival over set piece military sacrifice. 

Down with blunt testosterone male courage in lieu of feminist leadership. 

Meanwhile in the actual movie rather than the theology subplot the breathless attention deficit defying action grates on the admittedly humorous asides.

There could have been flashes of thought provoking brilliance but by the end the script's vocab range dies faster than a millennial's whatsapp group. 

Flashes of brilliance\, but in the end attempts too much over too long.
